file.name: advanced_payments.yaml
file.content:
openapi: 3.0.0
servers:
  - url: https://api.mercadopago.com
info:
  title: Mercado Pago API Reference
  version: '1.0'
paths:
  /v1/advanced_payments:
    post:
      tags:
        - $ref: '#/tags/marketplace'
      summary: Create Payments
      x-summary-i18n:
        eng: Create Payments
        spa: Crear un pago
        por: 
      description: Create Payments.
      deprecated: true
      requestBody:
        content:
          application/json:
            schema:
              type: object
              properties:
                payer:
                  type: object
                  description: payer identifier.
                  x-description-i18n:
                    eng: payer identifier.
                    spa: Identificador del pagador
                    por: Identificador do pagante
                  properties:
                    id:
                      type: string
                      description: Identification of the associated payer.
                      x-description-i18n:
                        eng: Identification of the associated payer.
                        spa: Identificación del pagador asociado
                        por: Identificação do pagador associado
                    email:
                      type: string
                      description: Payer’s email address.
                      x-description-i18n:
                        eng: Payer’s email address.
                        spa: E-mail del pagador
                        por: E-mail do pagante
                    type:
                      type: string
                      description: 
                        Type of identification of the associated payer (required
                        if the payer is a customer).
                      enum:
                        - customer -- The payer is a client and belongs to the collector
                        - registered -- The account corresponds to a registered user of Mercado Pago
                    identification:
                      type: object
                      description: Personal identification.
                      x-description-i18n:
                        eng: Personal identification.
                        spa: Identificación personal
                        por: Identificação pessoal
                      properties:
                        type:
                          type: string
                          description: Identification type.
                          x-description-i18n:
                            eng: Identification type.
                            spa: Tipo de identificación
                            por: Tipo de identificação
                        number:
                          type: string
                          description: Identification number.
                          x-description-i18n:
                            eng: Identification number.
                            spa: Número de identificación
                            por: Número de identificação
                    address:
                      type: object
                      description: Address.
                      x-description-i18n:
                        eng: Address.
                        spa: Dirección
                        por: Endereço
                      properties:
                        zip_code:
                          type: string
                          description: Zip Code.
                          x-description-i18n:
                            eng: Zip Code.
                            spa: Código postal
                            por: CEP
                        street_name:
                          type: string
                          description: Street name.
                          x-description-i18n:
                            eng: Street name.
                            spa: Calle
                            por: Rua
                        street_number:
                          type: number
                          description: Number.
                          x-description-i18n:
                            eng: Number.
                            spa: Número
                            por: Número
                    phone:
                      type: object
                      description: Phone number of the associated payer.
                      x-description-i18n:
                        eng: Phone number of the associated payer.
                        spa: Teléfono del pagador asociado
                        por: Telefone do pagante associado
                      properties:
                        area_code:
                          type: string
                          description: Area Code.
                          x-description-i18n:
                            eng: Area Code.
                            spa: Código de área
                            por: DDD
                        number:
                          type: string
                          description: Phone number.
                          x-description-i18n:
                            eng: Phone number.
                            spa: Número telefónico
                            por: Número de telefone
                        extension:
                          type: string
                          description: Phone number extension.
                          x-description-i18n:
                            eng: Phone number extension.
                            spa: Extensión del número de teléfono
                            por: Ramal do número de telefone
                    first_name:
                      type: string
                      description: Name of the associated payer.
                      x-description-i18n:
                        eng: Name of the associated payer.
                        spa: Nombre del pagador asociado
                        por: Nome do pagante associado
                    last_name:
                      type: string
                      description: Last name od the associated payer.
                payments:
                  type: array
                  description: List of payments made by the buyer.
                  x-description-i18n:
                    eng: List of payments made by the buyer.
                    spa: Lista de pagos realizados por el comprador
                    por: Lista de pagamentos feitos pelo comprador
                  items:
                    type: object
                    properties:
                      id:
                        type: number
                        description: Payment identification.
                        x-description-i18n:
                          eng: Payment identification.
                          spa: Identificador del pago
                          por: Identificador do pagamento
                      status:
                        type: string
                        description: Payment status.
                        x-description-i18n:
                          eng: Payment status.
                          spa: Estado del pago
                          por: Estado do pagamento
                      status_detail:
                        type: string
                        description: Payment status details.
                        x-description-i18n:
                          eng: Payment status details.
                          spa: Detalle del estado del pago
                          por: Detalhes do status do pagamento
                      payment_type_id:
                        type: string
                        description: Selected payment method type.
                        x-description-i18n:
                          eng: Selected payment method type.
                          spa: Tipo del medio de pago elegido
                          por: Tipo de meio de pagamento selecionado
                      payment_method_id:
                        type: string
                        description: Payment method selected to make the payment.
                        x-description-i18n:
                          eng: Payment method selected to make the payment.
                          spa: Medio de pago elegido para hacer el pago
                          por: Meio de pagamento selecionado para pagar
                      token:
                        type: string
                        description: Token card identifier.
                        x-description-i18n:
                          eng: Token card identifier.
                          spa: Identificador de card token
                          por: Identificador de token
                      transaction_amount:
                        type: number
                        description: Product cost.
                        x-description-i18n:
                          eng: Product cost.
                          spa: Costo del producto
                          por: Custo do produto
                      installments:
                        type: number
                        description: Number of installments selected.
                        x-description-i18n:
                          eng: Number of installments selected.
                          spa: Cantidad seleccionada de cuotas
                          por: Número de parcelas selecionado
                      processing_mode:
                        type: string
                        description: 
                          Method of processing the payments (aggregator by
                          default).
                        enum:
                          - aggregator -- Processes the payment using the commerce number of Mercado Pago
                          - gateway -- Processes the payment using the commerce number of the Seller
                      issuer_id:
                        type: string
                        description: Identifier of the issuer of the payment method.
                        x-description-i18n:
                          eng: Identifier of the issuer of the payment method.
                          spa: Identificador del emisor del medio de pago
                          por: Identificador do emissor do meio de pagamento
                      description:
                        type: string
                        description: Reason for payment.
                        x-description-i18n:
                          eng: Reason for payment.
                          spa: Razón de pago
                          por: Razão do pagamento
                      capture:
                        type: boolean
                        description: 
                          Determines whether the payment should be captured
                          (true, default value) or only reserved (false).
                      external_reference:
                        type: string
                        description: Identifier provided by the seller in their system.
                        x-description-i18n:
                          eng: Identifier provided by the seller in their system.
                          spa: Identificador provisto por el vendedor en su sistema
                          por: Identificador fornecido pelo vendedor no seu sistema
                      statement_descriptor:
                        type: string
                        description: How the payment will appear in the card statement.
                        x-description-i18n:
                          eng: How the payment will appear in the card statement.
                          spa: Cómo aparecerá el pago en el resumen de tarjeta
                          por: Como o pagamento aparecerá na fatura do cartão
                      date_of_expiration:
                        type: string
                        description: 
                          Expiration date for the case of payment method
                          "ticket".
                      transaction_details:
                        type: object
                        description: Group the transaction details.
                        x-description-i18n:
                          eng: Group the transaction details.
                          spa: Agrupa los detalles de la transacción
                          por: Agrupa os detalhes da transação
                        properties:
                          external_resource_url:
                            type: string
                            description: Identify the resource in the payment processor.
                            x-description-i18n:
                              eng: Identify the resource in the payment processor.
                              spa: Identifica el recurso en el procesador de pago
                              por: Identifica o recurso no processador de pagamento
                disbursements:
                  type: array
                  description: List of payments that correspond to each Seller.
                  x-description-i18n:
                    eng: List of payments that correspond to each Seller.
                    spa: Lista de pagos que corresponden a cada Vendedor
                    por: Lista de pagamentos que correspondem a cada Vendedor
                  items:
                    type: object
                    properties:
                      id:
                        type: number
                        description: Payment identifier.
                        x-description-i18n:
                          eng: Payment identifier.
                          spa: Identificador de pago
                          por: Identificador de pagamento
                      amount:
                        type: number
                        description: Payment amount.
                        x-description-i18n:
                          eng: Payment amount.
                          spa: Monto del pago
                          por: Valor do pagamento
                      external_reference:
                        type: string
                        description: Identifier provided by the seller in their system.
                        x-description-i18n:
                          eng: Identifier provided by the seller in their system.
                          spa: Identificador provisto por el vendedor en su sistema
                          por: Identificador fornecido pelo vendedor no seu sistema
                      collector_id:
                        type: number
                        description: Seller identifier.
                        x-description-i18n:
                          eng: Seller identifier.
                          spa: Identificador de vendedor
                          por: Identificador do vendedor
                      application_fee:
                        type: number
                        description: Commission collected by the Marketplace.
                        x-description-i18n:
                          eng: Commission collected by the Marketplace.
                          spa: Comisión recolectada por el Marketplace
                          por: Tarifa recolhida pelo Marketplace
                      money_release_days:
                        type: number
                        description: 
                          Number of days (from the date of approval of the
                          payment) in which the payment will be released to the
                          Seller.
                binary_mode:
                  type: boolean
                  description: 
                    When the payment is activated, it can only be approved or
                    rejected. Otherwise, the payment may be pending.
                metadata:
                  type: object
                  description: 
                    Valid JSON that can be added to the payment to save
                    additional attributes.
                application_id:
                  type: object
                  description: Marketplace ID.
                  x-description-i18n:
                    eng: Marketplace ID.
                    spa: ID del Marketplace
                    por: ID do Marketplace
                additional_info:
                  type: object
                  description: 
                    Information that can improve the fraud prevention analysis
                    and the conversion rate. Try sending us as much information
                    as possible.
                  properties:
                    ip_address:
                      type: string
                      description: IP from which the request comes (only for bank transfer)
                      x-description-i18n:
                        eng: IP from which the request comes (only for bank transfer)
                        spa: IP del cual proviene el request (sólo para transferencia bancaria)
                        por: IP de onde vem o request (somente transferência bancária)
                    items:
                      type: array
                      description: List of items to pay.
                      x-description-i18n:
                        eng: List of items to pay.
                        spa: Lista de ítems a pagar
                        por: Lista de itens a pagar
                      items:
                        type: object
                        properties:
                          id:
                            type: string
                            description: Item code.
                            x-description-i18n:
                              eng: Item code.
                              spa: Código de ítem
                              por: Código de anúncio
                          title:
                            type: string
                            description: Item name.
                            x-description-i18n:
                              eng: Item name.
                              spa: Nombre de ítem
                              por: Nome do item
                          description:
                            type: string
                            description: Item description.
                            x-description-i18n:
                              eng: Item description.
                              spa: Descripción del item
                              por: Descrição do artigo
                          picture_url:
                            type: string
                            description: Image URL.
                            x-description-i18n:
                              eng: Image URL.
                              spa: URL de imagen
                              por: URL da imagem
                          category_id:
                            type: string
                            description: Item category.
                            x-description-i18n:
                              eng: Item category.
                              spa: Category del ítem
                              por: Categoria do item
                          quantity:
                            type: number
                            description: Number of items.
                            x-description-i18n:
                              eng: Number of items.
                              spa: Cantidad de ítems
                              por: Número de itens
                          unit_price:
                            type: number
                            description: Unit price.
                    payer:
                      type: object
                      description: Buyer’s information.
                      x-description-i18n:
                        eng: Buyer’s information.
                        spa: Información del comprador
                        por: Informações do comprador
                      properties:
                        first_name:
                          type: string
                          description: Buyer’s name.
                          x-description-i18n:
                            eng: Buyer’s name.
                            spa: Nombre del comprador
                            por: Nome do comprador
                        last_name:
                          type: string
                          description: Buyer’s last name.
                          x-description-i18n:
                            eng: Buyer’s last name.
                            spa: Apellido del comprador
                            por: Sobrenome do comprador
                        phone:
                          type: object
                          description: Buyer’s phone number.
                          x-description-i18n:
                            eng: Buyer’s phone number.
                            spa: Teléfono del comprador
                            por: Telefone do comprador
                          properties:
                            area_code:
                              type: string
                              description: Area Code.
                              x-description-i18n:
                                eng: Area Code.
                                spa: Código de área
                                por: DDD
                            number:
                              type: string
                              description: Phone number.
                              x-description-i18n:
                                eng: Phone number.
                                spa: Número telefónico
                                por: Número de telefone
                        registration_date:
                          type: string
                          format: date
                          description: Date of registration of the buyer on your website.
                          x-description-i18n:
                            eng: Date of registration of the buyer on your website.
                            spa: Fecha de registración del comprador en tu sitio
                            por: Data de cadastro do comprador no seu site
                    shipments:
                      type: object
                      description: Shipping information.
                      x-description-i18n:
                        eng: Shipping information.
                        spa: Información de envío
                        por: Informações de envio
                      properties:
                        receiver_address:
                          type: object
                          description: Buyer’s address.
                          x-description-i18n:
                            eng: Buyer’s address.
                            spa: Dirección del comprador
                            por: Endereço do comprador
                          properties:
                            zip_code:
                              type: string
                              description: Zip Code.
                              x-description-i18n:
                                eng: Zip Code.
                                spa: Código postal
                                por: CEP
                            street_name:
                              type: string
                              description: Street name.
                              x-description-i18n:
                                eng: Street name.
                                spa: Calle
                                por: Rua
                            street_number:
                              type: number
                              description: Number.
                              x-description-i18n:
                                eng: Number.
                                spa: Número
                                por: Número
                            floor:
                              type: string
                              description: Floor
                              x-description-i18n:
                                eng: Floor
                                spa: Piso
                                por: Andar
                            apartment:
                              type: string
                              description: Unit.
                              x-description-i18n:
                                eng: Unit.
                                spa: Departamento
                                por: Apartamento
      responses:
        '400':
          description: Error
          x-description-i18n:
            eng: Error
            spa: Error
            por: Erro
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                type: object
                properties:
                  errorKey:
                    type: string
                    enum:
                      - 400004--Invalid application.
                      - 400005--The application is required.
                      - 400006--Invalid date of release for the Disbursement.
                      - 400007--Invalid date of release for the Disbursement.
                      - 400013--Invalid email address.
                      - 400014--Invalid number of payments.
                      - 400015--Payer ID is required for payments with money in the account.
                      - 400016--Invalid payment type.
                      - 400017--The transaction amount is required.
                      - 400018--Invalid amount.
                      - 400019--The payment method is required.
                      - 400020--The payment type is required.
                      - 400021--The amount format is invalid.
                      - 400022--Invalid processing method.
                      - 400023--The payer type is required.
                      - 400024--The payer’s name is required.
                      - 400025--The payer’s last name is required.
                      - 400026--The payer’s identification type is required.
                      - 400027--The payer’s identification number is required.
                      - 400028--The expiration date is required.
                      - 400029--The payment token is required.
                      - 400030--The installments are required.
                      - 400031--The amount of disbursements is required.
                      - 400032--The collector ID is required.
                      - 400033--Invalid Marketplace commission.
                      - 400034--Invalid disbursement amount.
                      - 400035--The field money_release_date is invalid.
                      - 400036--The Marketplace does not have permissions on the payer.
                      - 400037--The collector was not found.
                      - 400039--Invalid request.
                      - 400040--Invalid status.
                      - 400041--Invalid start date.
                      - 400042--Invalid end date.
                      - 400043--Invalid email address.
                      - 400044--Invalid payer ID.
                      - 400045--Invalid collector ID.
                      - 400046--The field external_reference is invalid.
                      - 400047--Some parameters of the search are invalid.
                      - 400048--Invalid ID.
                      - 400049--Invalid last modification date.
                      - 400051--The field money_release_date is required.
                      - 400052--The processing_mode is required.
                      - 400053--Invalid content.
                      - 400054--The Marketplace does not have permissions on the collector.
                      - 400055--The field external_reference is required.
                      - 400056--The field money_release_days is invalid.
                      - 400057--The fields collector_id and external_reference are duplicated.
                      - 400058--Invalid idempodency key.
        '401':
          description: Error
          x-description-i18n:
            eng: Error
            spa: Error
            por: Erro
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                type: object
                properties:
                  errorKey:
                    type: string
                    enum:
                      - 401000--Invalid access token.
                      - 401002--Invalid access token.
                      - 401003--Invalid device token.
        '404':
          description: Error
          x-description-i18n:
            eng: Error
            spa: Error
            por: Erro
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                type: object
                properties:
                  errorKey:
                    type: string
                    enum:
                      - 404001--The Disbursement was not found.
                      - 404002--The Advanced Payment was not found.
                      - 404003--The Payer was not found.
        '406':
          description: Error
          x-description-i18n:
            eng: Error
            spa: Error
            por: Erro
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                type: object
                properties:
                  errorKey:
                    type: string
                    enum:
                      - 406001--Error in the payments API.
  /v1/advanced_payments/{id}:
    get:
      tags:
        - $ref: '#/tags/marketplace'
      summary: Get a Payment
      x-summary-i18n:
        eng: Get a Payment
        spa: Obtener un pago
        por: 
      description: Get a Payment
      x-description-i18n:
        eng: Get a Payment
        spa: Obtener un pago
        por: 
      deprecated: true
      parameters:
        - name: id
          in: path
          description: Payment's Id
          x-description-i18n:
            eng: Payment's Id
            spa: Payment's Id
            por: Payment's Id
          required: true
          schema:
            type: string
            example: 12123adfasdf123u4u
      responses:
        '200':
          description: Success
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                type: object
                properties:
                  id:
                    type: number
                    example: 111111111
                    description: Payment id
                  status:
                    type: string
                    example: approved
                    description: Paymentstatus
                  payments:
                    type: array
                    items:
                      type: object
                      properties:
                        id:
                          type: number
                          example: 222222222
                          description: Payment id
                        status:
                          type: string
                          example: approved
                          description: Payment status
                        status_detail:
                          type: string
                          example: accredited
                          description: Payment status detail
                        payment_type_id:
                          type: string
                          example: credit_card
                          description: Payment type id
                        payment_method_id:
                          type: string
                          example: visa
                          description: Payment method id
                        token:
                          type: string
                          example: 98f6a9s7dfyihfasfdhasdjfhñasdfh
                          description: Payment token
                        transaction_amount:
                          type: number
                          example: 100
                          description: Payment transaction amount
                        installments:
                          type: number
                          example: 1
                          description: Payment installments
                        processing_mode:
                          type: string
                          example: aggregator
                          description: Payment processing_mode
                        description:
                          type: string
                          example: Payment description
                          description: Payment description
                        capture:
                          type: boolean
                          description: Captured?
                        external_reference:
                          type: string
                          example: ext_ref_payment
                          description: Payment external_reference
                        statement_descriptor:
                          type: string
                          example: MKT-STATEMENT-DESCRIPTION
                          description: Payment statement_descriptor
                    description: Payments
                  disbursements:
                    type: array
                    items:
                      type: object
                      properties:
                        id:
                          type: number
                          example: 33333333
                          description: disbursements id
                        amount:
                          type: number
                          example: 40
                          description: disbursements amount
                        external_reference:
                          type: string
                          example: ext_ref_disb_1
                          description: disbursements external_reference
                        collector_id:
                          type: number
                          example: 31313
                          description: disbursements collector_id
                        application_fee:
                          type: number
                          example: 5
                          description: disbursements application_fee
                        money_release_days:
                          type: number
                          example: 10
                          description: disbursements money_release_days
                        additional_info:
                          type: object
                          properties:
                            items:
                              type: object
                              properties:
                                id:
                                  type: string
                                  example: item-ID-1234
                                  description: id
                                title:
                                  type: string
                                  example: Title of what you are paying for
                                  description: title
                                picture_url:
                                  type: string
                                  example: https://www.mercadopago.com/logomp3.gif
                                  description: picture_url
                                description:
                                  type: string
                                  example: Item description
                                  x-example-i18n:
                                    eng: Item description
                                    spa: Descripción del item
                                    por: Descrição do item
                                  description: description
                                category_id:
                                  type: string
                                  example: art
                                  description: category_id
                                quantity:
                                  type: number
                                  example: 1
                                  description: quantity
                                unit_price:
                                  type: number
                                  example: 100
                                  description: unit_price
                              description: items
                            shipments:
                              type: object
                              properties:
                                receiver_address:
                                  type: object
                                  properties:
                                    zip_code:
                                      type: string
                                      example: 5700
                                      description: zip_code
                                    street_name:
                                      type: string
                                      example: Street
                                      description: street_name
                                    street_number:
                                      type: number
                                      example: 123
                                      description: street_number
                                    floor:
                                      type: number
                                      example: 4
                                      description: floor
                                    apartment:
                                      type: string
                                      example: C
                                      description: apartment
                                  description: receiver_address
                              description: shipments
                          description: additional_info
                    description: disbursements
                  payer:
                    type: object
                    properties:
                      email:
                        type: string
                        example: test@user.com
                        description: email
                      first_name:
                        type: string
                        example: Test
                        description: first_name
                      last_name:
                        type: string
                        example: Test
                        description: last_name
                      address:
                        type: object
                        properties:
                          zip_code:
                            type: string
                            example: 1111
                            description: zip_code
                          street_name:
                            type: string
                            example: Calle
                            description: street_name
                          street_numer:
                            type: string
                            example: 120
                            description: street_numer
                        description: address
                      identification:
                        type: object
                        properties:
                          type:
                            type: string
                            example: DNI
                            description: type
                          number:
                            type: string
                            example: 88999000
                            description: number
                        description: identification
                    description: payer
                  external_reference:
                    type: string
                    example: ext_ref_adv_paym
                    description: external_reference
                  description:
                    type: string
                    example: Advanced payment description
                    description: description
                  binary_mode:
                    type: boolean
                    description: binary_mode
                  date_created:
                    type: string
